images.caption: Figure 1:Illustration of our Process-based Self-Rewarding paradigm.(1) We get EFT data by tree-search, initial data filtering and data annotation. And we get IFT data by step segmentation. (2) The model is initialized on EFT and IFT data. (3) The model conducts step-by-step search-based reasoning and performs step-wise LLM-as-a-Judge to select the chosen step and generate the step-wise preference pair at each step. (4) We perform step-wise preference optimization on the model. (5) The model enters the next iteration cycle.
